function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Change from PCR fluorescence probing to clinical diagnosis without justification","Impact":"Inaccurate reporting of new cases and potential misdiagnosis of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Provide justification for changes in diagnostic methods and verify accuracy of diagnosis","Technologies":"Verification of diagnostic methods, standardization of diagnostic protocols","People":"Public health officials, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Uncertainty and irregular shape of traditional unit for quarantine measures","Impact":"Greater difficulties in modeling and implementing precise quarantine measures","Mitigation":"Standardize and define clear guidelines for quarantine unit sizes and shapes, improve access to administrative division data","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, data visualization software","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
